name: baret
description: Baret is a library that allows you to embed Bacon.js observables into React VDOM

scripts.dist: npm run dist:umd & npm run dist:umd.min & npm run dist:es & npm run dist:cjs & wait
scripts.dist:cjs: NODE_ENV=           rollup -c -n baret -i src/baret.js -f cjs -o dist/baret.cjs.js
scripts.dist:es: NODE_ENV=           rollup -c -n baret -i src/baret.js -f es  -o dist/baret.es.js
scripts.dist:umd: NODE_ENV=dev        rollup -c -n baret -i src/baret.js -f umd -o dist/baret.js
scripts.dist:umd.min: NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -n baret -i src/baret.js -f umd -o dist/baret.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run dist && npm run test
